forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the hours creep toward the end of the evening, Downtown San Francisco finds itself wrapped in a soft blanket of clouds, with temperatures hovering comfortably around 50 degrees. The gentle west-southwest wind whispers through the city streets, brushing against the faces of those out for an evening stroll. The atmosphere carries a hint of the ocean’s salt and coolness, embracing the unique magic of a city known for its fog yet curiously retaining a certain clarity tonight.

Looking ahead, Sunday promises a metamorphosis, with sunny skies expected to peek through as the day unfolds. The forecast hints at temperatures rising to the low 60s, and as morning gives way to afternoon, a slight dip is anticipated. The southwest breeze will remain a considerate companion, offering a light touch rather than a forceful chill. A light jacket or a cozy sweater will be the right call for those venturing out, ideal for a leisurely brunch at one of the local cafés or a stroll along the waterfront, where the Bay’s allure shines brightest. Whether one chooses to explore the city's vibrant art scene or simply enjoy a serene moment in a park, the pleasant conditions are sure to uplift spirits.
